title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Asynchronous Online-Based University Teaching Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more effective university lecture design strategies for asynchronous online environments.
Learners can apply teaching methodologies for digital tool utilization and interaction facilitation to actual lecture scenarios.
Learners complete and submit an instructional design project incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
